title: Hong Kong protests: Man ‘shot in chest’ as police fire live rounds
text:
A protester has been shot in the chest as Hong Kong police fired live rounds, according to local media.

Police fired several rounds of live fire as tens of thousands of pro-democracy protesters took to the streets, urging China's Communist Party to "return power to the people" as the party celebrated its 70th year in power.

A police source told the South China Morning Post that live fire had been used, and a man had been hit.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

More follows…
